headline: Power Over Ethernet Chipsets Market Report 2026 - Global Industry Size, Share, Trends, Opportunity, and Forecast, 2021-2031
summary: The PoE chipsets market is poised for growth driven by smart building automation, Wi-Fi 6/7, and 5G deployment. Challenges like interoperability and equipment standards present hurdles, while trends push for energy-efficient designs. Major players include Cisco, Analog Devices, and STMicroelectronics.
